name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.7.3
- Updated JPN translation (vanadi910)
- Fix game not running with ZHS language selected.

0.7.2
- JPN translation by vanadi910!
- Wither cards you own (not created in combat) glow purple.
- Wither cards glow green when you have negation.
- Ritual Plumage now highlights the end turn button.
- Stick Smack+ now correctly previews a Stick+.
- Added Watcher cards to Sacred Deck.
- Fixed Sacred Deck crash with other mods. (thanks Aphid)
- Removed Beta, Omega, Expunger from Sacred Deck. (thanks iruleatgames)
- Sacred Deck and Crazy Rituals no longer treat Watcher's individual Wish options as separate cards.
- Cultist Mask easter egg now only works on Beaked.
- Keyworded Plated Armor & fixed Depleted description not showing up sometimes.
- More wording updates & reverted some for clarity.

0.7.1
- New art! Thanks to i like trains and Kaamalauppias!

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
